resources.string: This app is the demo of a open source Android library called InAppDevTools.
InAppDevTools is a collection of tools for debugging, inspecting and reporting from within your own application... on the same screen!
You can open our tools at any time to inspect your running app. Just shake your device, tap our notification or tap our floating icon.
On crash our tools will automatically pop up, showing a visual stacktrace
You can browse some dummy activities to generate more data to inspect
For installation instructions or to get more info, visit our GitHub repo
InAppDevTools doesn\'t inspect/debug other installed apps. It only works with APK\'s who has been built with our library inside
